Corrie Stroup

Front-End Developer | Designer

Welcome, I'm Corrie Stroup, a Front-End Developer, born and raised in the Southern/Mid-Western US. I currently live in Vietnam with my lovely wife and three adorable (and frustrating) cats.

About Me

"Corrie", you say, "what do you even do?".

That is an excellent question, so let me give you an excellent answer.

What I do is both simple and complicated: I created something out of nothing and when something is created, I'm not satisfied and continue updating and recreating something until it infects my dreams and I can think of nothing other than something.

Then I git commit -m "Please help me".
